text: Chinaŵambasye ku ma Ȃya Gangu aŵala ŵaakulikwesya pa chilambo mwangali ligongo lyakuona, mwanti naga ali achiweni chilosyo chilichose ngakasachikulupililaga, soni naga ali aliweni litala lyachongoko ngakulitenda kuŵa litala, nambo naga aliweni litala lyakusokonechela akulitendaga kuŵa litala, yalakweyo ni ligongo lyanti ŵanganyao ŵakaaniile ilosyo Yetu, niŵaliji soni ali nkuikwanjila
